page.title: 17SPECIAL EDUCATION (2)
page.content: {THE HAWTHORNS}WAS BUILT IN 1983 AND IS FOR CHILDREN AGED 2-17 YEARS WHO ARE MENTALLY HANDICAPPED. IT HAS 70 PUPILS: 48 BOYS AND 22 GIRLS. MOST CHILDREN LIVE WITHIN A 5 MILE RADIUS OF THE SCHOOL. 60 OF THE CHILDREN HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS AND 10 SANDWICHES. THEY USE A COMPUTER AS A TEACHING AID. THEY DO NOT USE PHYSICAL PUNISHMENT BUT USE 'BEHAVIOUR MODIFICATION'. {LONGFORD SCHOOL}IS FOR EDUCATION- ALLY SUB-NORMAL CHILDREN. IT HAS 104 PUPILS: 64 BOYS AND 40 GIRLS. THE SCHOOL HAS 9 CLASSROOMS AND 13 TEACHERS. 32 CHILDREN HAVE SANDWICHES AT LUNCHTIME AND 72 HAVE SCHOOL DINNERS. THE SCHOOL HAS 2 COMPUTERS WHICH ARE USED FOR REMEDIAL WORK AND FOR LEISURE ACTIVITIES.
